name: One Degree of Scandalous with Tom Zenner and Kato Kaelin

episodes.title: We Visited the Charles Manson's Kill Sites — Here’s What We Found
episodes.description: Step into the chilling world of # CharlesManson and his followers. In this special documentary episode of One Degree of Scandalous, Tom Zenner and Kato Kaelin visit the real crime scenes tied to the Manson Family murders. What happened at these places, what remains today, and where are the key figures now? Locations include: • Spahn Ranch – Manson’s base of operations. • LaBianca House: The home of the first victim. • Sharon Tate’s former residence — the site of the most infamous crime. We explore: • What happened at each location during the Manson murders. • Who the victims and perpetrators were. • What remains at these sites today. • Where the key figures are now. From Manson’s twisted cult beginnings to the gruesome murders that shocked the world, this deep dive reveals the dark underbelly of 1960s Los Angeles—and how the hippie dream turned into a nightmare. #CharlesManson #TrueCrime #HelterSkelter #MansonMurders Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/one-degree-of-scandalous-with-tom-zenner-and-kato-kaelin--6258576/support .
